Package dtu.ws.fastmoney.persistency

Class InMemoryRepository

  • java.lang.Object
    • dtu.ws.fastmoney.persistency.InMemoryRepository
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Repository
    public class InMemoryRepository
extends java.lang.Object
implements Repository
    Stores the bank data in a hash map of account numbers to accounts.

      • executeInTransaction

        public void executeInTransaction​(UnitFunction f)
                          throws BankServiceException
        Description copied from interface: Repository
        Executes a set of commands in the context of a database transaction. This can be used as follows repo.executeInTransaction(() -> {...;});
        Specified by:
        executeInTransaction in interface Repository
        Parameters:
        f - is an instance of class UnitFunction representing a method with no arguments and no return value
        Throws:
        BankServiceException - when the transaction fails after the transaction was rolled back
